entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Exception from Visual Studio while coding #72076
  • Exception from Visual Studio while coding #72075
  • Exception from Visual Studio while coding #72074
  • Develop a plan for testing MSBuildWorkspace against a variety of SDK versions #72071
  • Exception from Visual Studio while coding #72067
  • ForAttributeWithMetadataName could run faster if the tree stored a bit on nodes that contained attributes or not. #72066
  • Add `WorkspaceKind.Primary` and use it for VisualStudioWorkspace #72064
  • CSC Crash: This program location is thought to be unreachable. File='/_/src/Compilers/CSharp/Portable/Symbols/FunctionTypeSymbol.cs' Line=144 #72056
    17.10
  • Codefix suggestion: use collection expression spread when collection types don't match #72055

Closed

  • Regular occurrence of `CSharpIntroduceParameterCodeRefactoringProvider` error #72034
  • NotNullIfNotNull also requires casting to non-nullable type for valuetypes #71728

PullRequests

Created

  • Do not attempt to update generated code in 'Convert to record' #72073
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Improve NotNullWhenFalse_ReturningObject test #72072
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Experiment to grab 4 more bits for use as node flags. #72070
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add tests validating behavior #72068
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Handle all workspaces in VS impl of ISolutionAnalyzerSetterWorkspaceService #72065
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use collection expressions in IDE code. #72063
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Change NullableWalker.VisitConversion to not unsplit #72062
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Fix race conditions in TestNoBlockOnCompletionItems4 #72061
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix race condition in RequestExecutionQueue #72059
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Always publish logs for CI builds #72058
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Re-add EA.RazorCompiler IVT #72057
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Remove the AllSyntaxTreesParsed compilation tracker state. #72021
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Test MSBuildWorkspace opening `dotnet new` projects. #69225
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Switch analyzer to be a syntax node analyzer #72049
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix crash in Introduce Parameter where ObjectCreationExpressionSyntax were being casted to InvocationExpressions #72060
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Break a cycle through attributes #72041
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Merge 'dotnet/main' into ParamsCollections #72042
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Restored the reverted XAML PR (Support XAML LSP in VS Code #70170) #71758
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Improve use of SyntaxContext in snippet and method/type import completion providers #71872
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Restore background loading for RoslynPackage #72054
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Support relative paths in interceptors #71879
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Definition items #71959
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • All pull diagnostics changes. #62771
    Area-IDE
  • Make getting a frozen partial snapshot async. #72026
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove -windows TFM being used in MSBuild tests #72040
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Cache frozen partial solution snapshots acquired off of a solution instance #71999
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove "is final document state" from compilation trackers. #72045
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Implement module cancellation and stack probing instrumentations #71896
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Handle ref safety of user-defined conversions #71911
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Lookup in extended type (simple name and member access) #71779
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • [VB] Improve casting from floating-point or decimal types to integer types in more cases #71838
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Onboard C# Intellisense page to Unified Settings #71780
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Implement control flow graph for Lock object feature #71987
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove roslyn implementation of error list #62741
    Area-IDE
  • Remove 'Push' diagnostics option #62735
    Area-IDE
  • Refactor where we do project type detection and sending telemetry #71969
    Area-IDE
  • Improve codegen for concatenation of `string` and `char` (attempt 2) #71793
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Fix quick info for anonymous types not escaping identifiers named as keywords #72047
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Option type renames #71958
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix NRE in primary constructor XML doc binder #72006
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Consider `params` and default values when comparing signatures #71380
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, New Language Feature - Default lambda parameters
  • Add compilation start / stop ETW events #72031
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Semantic search #71268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
